Hiker Finds 3,500-Yr-Old Egyptian Seal in Israel—Carved in the shape of a beetle, the scarab represents Pharaoh Thutmose III (1481-1425 BC) sitting on his throne. He set up govt in Canaan & waged wars, including battle of Megiddo—a victory documented on Karnak Temple walls.
